description.narrative: The Women Deliver 2019 Conference is viewed by stakeholders as a pivotal opportunity to make game changing progress for girls and women a reality. This project will address the Women Deliver 2019 Conference and specifically seek to provide travel support to the conference for young women; the majority from Africa. The target group for this project includes 75 young women from Africa. These attendees will engage in networking opportunities, learn from (or give) presentations and exhibits, and contribute to the diversity of the voices at Women Deliver, thereby increasing the richness of in program and attendee experience. Attendance at the conference should inspire youth to contribute to women’s equality upon return home as well .
